title: Mogil'nik Ashpyl
description: Burial site in the Minusinsk Basin (southern Siberia) containing over 50 burials dated to the 1st millennium BCE.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate center point of the Mogil'nik Ashpyl site, derived from an OpenStreetMap Node after Badetskaia 2018.
properties.title: OSM location of Mogil'nik Ashpyl
